content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: ETCD
      operator: non_empty
    - name: ETCD
      operator: is_not_contained_by
      value: $te_etcd
Operations:
  - domain: TE
    id: $te_etcd
    name: ETCD
    operator: distinct
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.222
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: The values of ETCD used in the Trial Arms dataset must match values for
  the same Element in the Trial Elements dataset.
Outcome:
  Message: TA.ETCD is not present in TE.ETCD
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '222'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The values of ETCD used in the Trial Arms dataset
                  must match values for the same Element in the Trial Elements dataset.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: 7.2.1.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TA

json.Description: The values of ETCD used in the Trial Arms dataset must match values for the same Element in the Trial Elements dataset.

Outcome.Message: TA.ETCD is not present in TE.ETCD

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The values of ETCD used in the Trial Arms dataset must match values for the same Element in the Trial Elements dataset.
